# DevPrep - Developer Interview Preparation Platform
> Complete platform for developer interview preparation, mock interviews, resume building, and skill enhancement.

This file guides AI language models on how to interact with our site's content.

## Core Pages
- [/]: Main landing page.
- [/signin]: Sign in page for existing users.
- [/signup]: Sign up page for new users.

## Main Features
- [/home]: User dashboard after signing in.
- [/skills]: Skill assessment and practice area.
- [/roadmap]: Personalized learning roadmaps.
- [/interview]: Mock interview preparation.
- [/resume-form]: Build and enhance your resume.
- [/machine-coding]: Practice machine coding rounds.
- [/esmoai]: AI-powered learning assistant.
- [/plan-your-day]: Schedule your preparation tasks.
- [/community]: Community forum.
- [/findevents]: Find tech events.
